column3: Any idea why it was a pointer in the first place? Always happy to get rid of pointers.\n\nconcept ACK

The pointer argument was introduced in 1df206f854. Maybe @achow101 remembers?\n\nAt that time the `keystore` argument was used in two expressions inside `AddrToPubKey()`: `GetKeyForDestination(*keystore, dest)` and `keystore->GetPubKey()`. The first takes a const reference arg and in the second `GetPubKey()` method is marked as `const` (even back then). So it cannot have been that `keystore` was

> So maybe it was due to some code mimicing?

More like code copying.

Concept ACK
